name: Planet 7: No Data
description:
You are on an unknown planet without any knowledge of what is around you.

The hatch of your escape pod got stuck and you only have 2 minutes worth of oxygen.

You have to find out how to get back inside your escape pod in order to survive.

WASD / Arrow keys - Move
E - Interact / Pickup items

Programming, Artwork - Belonzik

Music, SFX - pl4typus
